name: Chaos Collider
description:
edit: CLICK IN THE SCREEN AFTER THE GAME OPENS.
when entering fullscreen you have to click on the screen to focus the window and the game can start recognizing  inputs. 

  How to play - WASD control the blue box acceleration.

  Objective - You earn points by pushing the yellow box to the green objective. The only way to do that is by using your blue box collision with the other objects on the map.
The red boxes are there to get in your way.

This game was made from scratch in 48 hours for the gmtk game jam.
We used PixiJS as our renderer. PixiJS in the only dependency of the game.
